page.title: 12Playground Games
page.content: We like playing '44 home', when the bushes and the grass are dry, we hide everywhere we can and try and try and get back to the post without being seen. 'Cut and Mouse' is a game to save mice from the cat's basket. 'Come to Coventry' is another version of Hide and Seek. If caught and you can see somebody waving at you, you escape when the person who is 'it' is not looking. 'Tag' is a game that is very old and was played by children quite a long time ago; the rules have not been changed. 'Scarecrow' is another tag game. If somebody is chasing you you put up your arms and look like a scarecrow. When the person who is 'it' is not near, omebody will run under your arms and you are then free.
